forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 48 overnight. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North wind around 8 mph.

weather_report:
Morning in Downtown San Francisco begins with a gentle embrace of partly cloudy skies, the remnants of marine air drifting upwards as the city quietly stirs. The temperature holds at a cool 46 degrees, with a subtle rise unfolding through the night. As the sun emerges, it will beckon brighter moments, the forecast hinting at a mostly sunny day ahead, reaching near a pleasant 60. The north wind, whispering softly at 8 mph, carries the promise of clarity—ideal for those wishing to bask in the invigorating air.

The horizon glows slightly with the golden undertones of the sun, though the marine layer clings resiliently to the coastal edges—an artist's pale brush against the vibrant cityscape. For those stepping out, layers will serve well; a light jacket draped over a comfortable sweater or a long-sleeved shirt will keep the coolness at bay while allowing for a balance of warmth as the sun's rays penetrate the skyline. Given the day's affable temperament, it could be an exquisite opportunity to stroll along the waterfront, savoring a warm coffee from a nearby café or exploring the unique nooks of local boutiques. An escape into the urban gardens would also harmonize beautifully with the day—nature entwined with the city's pulse, promising a moment of reflection amidst the bustle.
